SENATE BILL No. 370
_____
DIGEST OF  INTRODUCED B ILL
Citations Affected:  IC 12-15-13-10; IC 25-1-8.5.
Synopsis:  Health care matters.  Requires Medicaid reimbursement for
outpatient covered services at a hospital to be at the same
reimbursement rate as that provided for the equivalent services at a
physician's office. Provides exceptions. Requires specified reporting by
hospitals and physicians to the office of the attorney general
concerning: (1) a merger or acquisition of a physician group practice;
and (2) employment of a physician. Requires the department of
insurance to submit a report to the general assembly concerning the
advisability and feasibility of expanding site neutral reimbursement to
commercial health insurance. 
Effective:  July 1, 2025.
Buck
January 13, 2025, read first time and referred to Commi ttee on Health and Provi der
Services.

1 SECTION 1. IC 12-15-13-10 IS ADDED TO THE INDIANA
2 CODE AS A NEW SECTION TO READ AS FOLLOWS
3 [EFFECTIVE JULY 1, 2025]: Sec. 10. The office shall reimburse a
4 hospital licensed under IC 16-21-2 for a Medicaid covered service
5 that is provided in an outpatient setting at the same reimbursement
6 rate as that provided at a physician's office for the equivalent
7 covered outpatient service unless:
8 (1) the hospital setting used technology only available in a
9 hospital setting; or
10 (2) there is an evidence based rationale for providing a
11 different reimbursement rate.
